title: Utilization of Musa acuminata Blossom Peel Waste mediated heterogeneous Catalyst for Biodiesel production from Sesame oil

Peel waste of Musa acuminata blossom after fruit maturation was used for the preparation of a heterogeneous catalyst. The prepared catalyst was utilised for the transesterification of Sesame oil (oil...
